3.questionText: Should we patch the breaking change: Major: response.text() no longer attempts to detect encoding, instead always opting for UTF-8 (per spec); use response.textConverted() for the v1 behavior

4.questionText: Should we patch the breaking change: Major: make response.json() throw error instead of returning an empty object on 204 no-content respose (per spec; reverts behavior changed in v1.6.2)

8.questionText: Should we patch the breaking change: Enhance: make sure header names and values are valid in HTTP
